fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Competition, Environment, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
head_office_address: c/o Wallenius Wilhelmsen Logistics Strandveien 20 Lysaker, Oslo
eu_initiatives: Implementation of the Sulphur Directive (2012/33/EU) in particular enforcement of the sulphur limits for maritime fuels.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: European Sustainable Shipping Forum (ESSF)#E02869#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2869#Not a member#C#Air Emissions from Ships
goals__remit: The Trident Alliance is a coalition of ship owners and operators in favour of effective enforcement of martimie sulphur regulation and co-operates with other stakeholders to realise this objective. Robust enforcement is essential for avoiding competition disturbance (the level playing field) among ship operators and owners, considering the large financial gains of gross violation.
relevant_communication: Members of the Trident Alliance advise national authorities and ports on enforcement measures for the sulphur limits to marine fuels.
